mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_NO, PROVIDER, PROVIDER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, PROFILE_IMAGE, EMAIL, NICKNAME, PHONE, ADDRESS) VALUES (SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{provider}, #{providerId}, #{memberName}, #{profileImage}, #{email}, #{nickName}, #{phone}, #{address})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET NICKNAME = #{nickName}, EMAIL = #{email}, PHONE = #{phone}, ADDRESS = #{address} WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
